name: OLANZAPINE ODT TEVA ® 10 MG
treatmentDescriptions: Acute and maintenance treatment of schizophrenia. Olanza ODT Teva is indicated for the management  of the manifestations of psychotic disorders.Olanza ODT Teva is indicated for the short-term treatment of acute manic episodes associated with Bipolar I Disorder. Prevention of recurrence in Bipolar Disorder : In patients whose manic episode has responded to olanzapine treatment Olanza ODT Teva is indicated for the prevention of recurrence in patients with Bipolar Disorder. Combination therapy in Bipolar I Disorder: The combination of Olanza ODT Teva with lithium or valproate is indicated for the short-term treatment of acute manic episodes associated with Bipolar I Disorder.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
